allow: Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", ""Rate"", ""AnnualizedRate"", ""RecordedAt"" FROM ""FundingRates"" WHERE ""Symbol"" = ''COAIUSDT'' ORDER BY ""RecordedAt"" DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", ""Rate"", ""FundingIntervalHours"", ""Average3DayRate"", ""AnnualizedRate"" FROM ""FundingRates"" WHERE ""Symbol"" = ''COAIUSDT'' ORDER BY ""RecordedAt"" DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ""FundingRates"";")

Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", COUNT(*) as count FROM ""FundingRates"" GROUP BY ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"" ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ""Exchange"" || ''-'' || ""Symbol"") as unique_symbols, MIN(""RecordedAt"") as first_record, MAX(""RecordedAt"") as last_record, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM ""FundingRates"";")
Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "TRUNCATE TABLE ""FundingRates"" RESTART IDENTITY;")
Bash(docker exec crypto-arbitrage-db psql -U postgres -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", ""Rate"", ""RecordedAt"" FROM ""FundingRates"" ORDER BY ""RecordedAt"" DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", ""Rate"", ""FundingIntervalHours"", ""Average3DayRate"", ""AnnualizedRate"", ""RecordedAt"" FROM ""FundingRates"" WHERE ""Symbol"" = ''COAIUSDT'' ORDER BY ""RecordedAt"" DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, COUNT(DISTINCT ""Exchange"") as exchanges, MIN(""RecordedAt"") as oldest, MAX(""RecordedAt"") as newest FROM ""FundingRates"";")
Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", COUNT(*) as count FROM ""FundingRates"" GROUP BY ""Exchange"" ORDER BY ""Exchange"";")

Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", ""Rate"", ""FundingIntervalHours"", ""Average3DayRate"", ""AnnualizedRate"", ""RecordedAt"" FROM ""FundingRates"" WHERE ""Symbol"" = ''COAIUSDT'' ORDER BY ""Exchange"";")
Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''FundingRates'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''ActiveExecutions'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(psql -U sansel -d crypto_arbitrage -c "SELECT ""Exchange"", ""Symbol"", ""Rate"", ""FundingIntervalHours"", ""Average3DayRate"", ""AnnualizedRate"", ""RecordedAt"" FROM ""FundingRates"" ORDER BY ""RecordedAt"" DESC LIMIT 5;")
